entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
